definitions.body: lifting up [[גֵּאוּת עָשָׁן]] column of smoke Is 9:17; [[גֵּאוּת הַיׇּם]] swelling of the sea Ps 89:10.

majesty of God Ps 93:1, Is 26:10; [[גֵּאוּת עָשָׂה]] he hath done majestically Is 12:5; [[עֲטֶרֶת גֵּאוּת]] crown of majesty Is 28:1, Is 28:3 (Samaria, on a round hill majestically commanding the country).
pride [[דִּבְּרוּ בְגֵאוּת]] they speak proudly Ps 17:10; so for [[נְאוֹת]] Ps 74:20 Bi Che.
